text: Tackey & Tsubasa (タッキー&翼) is a Japanese pop duo from Johnny & Associates. Its two members are Hideaki Takizawa (Japanese: 滝沢秀明, Takizawa Hideaki) and Tsubasa Imai (今井翼, Imai Tsubasa). They are known for their Japanese television dramas and they have been successful with numerous hit singles, especially "Kamen" and "Venus". Their records are produced by Avex Trax. == Discography == === Singles === # (26.02.2003) To be, To be, Ten made To be # (12.11.2003) Yume Monogatari (夢物語) # (11.02.2004) One Day, One Dream # (03.11.2004) Serenade (愛想曲(セレナーデ)) # (04.05.2005) Kamen/Mirai Koukai (仮面/未来航海) # (18.01.2006) Venus # (09.08.2006) Ho! Summer (Ho! サマー) # (04.18.2007) x ~Dame~ / Crazy Rainbow (x～ダメ～ / Crazy Rainbow) # (08.08.2007) SAMURAI === Albums === # (11.09.2002) Hatachi # (28.04.2005) Twenty Two # (15.11.2006) Two You Four You === Compilations === # (17.10.2007) Tackey & Tsubasa BEST Album == Other websites == * Tackey & Tsubasa Official Website * Tackey & Tsubasa Oricon Page * Takizawa Hideaki fansite * Imai Tsubasa fansite Category:Japanese boy bands
title: Tackey and Tsubasa
